title: PLEASE RIOT DONT GIVE ME A LEAVERBUSTER IT KEPT ME ON SCREEN FOREVER
body:
I didnt do anything i went into a normal game and everything froze i never afked this year please i dont want to get a leavebuster :(
name : Xkillertenzo
server NA

replies.body:
Being stuck in champ select is often caused by a poor connection between your client and the game server. Most of the time, this is due to local network configurations that cause an unstable connection to our servers. I strongly recommend you start the troubleshooting process by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are good.

Let me know if these issues persist through those changes.

Thanks targon for understanding glad i didnt get a leaverbuster i dont afk often most of my games this year were played no afking at all my connection is connected to a ethernet port on my router and i thought this was a bug so i wanted to report it as soon as possible so it dosent happen again i dont want this happening in ranked games either so i reinstalled league but thanks for the support.

This has happened to me several time over the past few days to the point Im up to a 30min queue timer...

I've swapped over to the alpha client, cos thats more stable than the normal one
